reviewText: This disc doesn't contain all of the Fleischer or Famous Studios 1940's Superman cartoons, but it does contain quite a few, including the politically incorrect "Japoteurs" and "Jungle Drums." And although they don't seem to be heroes at all, the human duo of Tom and Jerry from Van Beuren Studios kick up some really strange and entertaining 1930's animated antics in "Pots and Pans."
